history.proof: induction ns; simpl in *; intros. - inv H. - destruct (adjacent_to_dec h a) eqn:?H. + hauto lq: on depth: 3. + qsimpl time: 1. sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: destruct H as [ [n m0] [? ?] ]; simpl in *; subst.

original: induction ns; simpl in *; intros. - inv H. - destruct (adjacent_to_dec h a) eqn:?H. + apply in_map_iff in H. destruct H as [ [n m0] [? ?] ]; simpl in *; subst. inv H0. rewrite e; simpl. rewrite tot_map_msg_idem; auto. + destruct H; [subst; simpl; auto |]. eauto.
